title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/larzlo-bowden.html
notes:
Frank Larzlo most recently appeared in GO LOKO. He was also the mastermind behind if you want to send a message, use western union and HOWDJA LIKE THEM APPLES?.
Frank is widely acknowledged as the European fruit export industry's funniest defender against '419' scammers, and one of Feerik Island's most revered citizens.


Here he springs to the defense of a poor refugee trying to claim her inheritance, whose crooked barrister (and possible alter ego) is not acting in her best interests. Result: two weeks of scammer time wasted, and fun had!

messages.body:
malar-kyam0020@hotmail.com
to me



Hello Dear,


It's my pleasure to know how you are doing? I pray this mail will reach you in a good health. I am Miss Malaria K. Bowden, 20years of age, a medical student from the republic of Somalia) and presently i am residing in the refugee camp as a result of the civil war going on in my country. I am the only Daughter of my late parents who die during the Crisis in my country Somalia) My father name is late Dr Kyama Bowden. He was a business man, he deals on lime stone in Mogadishu, But he was killed along side with my mother during the Crisis. and all his properties was totally destroyed. I know you may wonder why i am so soon telling you about all this, even without seeing or knowing you fully well.


I got your contact email from Google directory and really something tells me you can help me and it is better to trust you than to die in this charity camp where I have no body to help me. However after my parents death, I managed to escape with a very important documents. DEPOSIT CERTIFICATE of ($4.950,000.00) in a financial company. I need your help to achieve this because of my situation here. and to come over and join you in your country to continue my studies, while you will help me to invest the fund. I am willing to give you 30% for your assistant Input in any expensive to achieve the deposit, while the rest will be for investment in your country.  Please contact me on my personal
emails:-(malar-kyam0020@hotmail.com) and i will tell you more about myself and how we'll proceed.


God bless.
Miss Malaria K. Bowden.
(malar.kyam0020@yahoo.com)

Miss Malaria K Bowden

Miss Malaria K. Bowden.
(malar.kyam0020@yahoo.com)

MALARIA? Malaria is a mosquito-borne infectious disease ... nice name choice here!!

Standard orphan letter. More commonly the orphan's father was a cocoa or gold merchant, whose evil colleagues poisoned him during a trip to France.
This 'format' seems to be a literary descendant of the nineteenth-century Lettre de Jérusalem, described by E. F. Vidocq.

messages.body:
Miss Malaria K. Bowden.,


Glad to hearing you.


Hope you're doing fine.


Send me more news.


Take care!


Franz
messages.raw:
Franz Larzlo

Miss Malaria K. Bowden.,

Glad to hearing you.

Hope you're doing fine.

messages.body:
malar-kyam0020@hotmail.com
to me



Hello My Dearest Franz.
I am more than happy for your reply and to write you this mail. How is the day? hope fine and this mail will reach you in a good health. Mine here is very hot and like you know I am living in the charity refugee camp here in Dakar Senegal.
In this camp we are only allowed to go out only on Mondays and Fridays of the weeks. Its just like one staying in the prison, I am suffering in this place, and i hope by Gods grace i will come out here by your help. I don't have any relatives now whom i can go to all my relatives ran away in the middle of the war.. Here the camp have two hostels one for men the other for women. i am leaving in the woman's hostel.
I haven't a personal telephone to be reached, but if you wish to hear my voice, you can reach me through the liability telephone number of mission camp is 00221-777927968 . If you call tell the Rev father or sister that you want to speak with  Miss Malaria K. Bowden. am staying in Hostel Block A001.  As a refugee here i don't have any right or privileged to any thing be it money or whatever because it is against the law of this country. I want to go back to my studies because i only attended my first year before the tragic incident that lead to my being in this situation.. Please listen to this, i have my late father's deposit certificate and death certificate here with me which i will send to you later, because when my late father was alive he deposited some amount of money in a leading Finances Company, which he used my name as the next of kin as i told you in my first mail.
So i will like you to help me transfer this money to your account and from it you can send some money for me to get my traveling documents and air ticket to come over and join you in your country to continue my studies, because I want to be a doctor, so that I will be able to help and save others life, it has been my dreams from my childhood.  I kept this secret to people in the camp.
So in the light of above i will like you to keep this issue to  yourself and don't tell it to anyone for i am afraid of loosing my life and the money if people gets to know about it.
Remember i am giving you all this information due-to the trust i deposited on you.  I like honest and understanding people,truthful and a man of vision.
Meanwhile i will like you to call me on phone, like i said i need your help and I want you to kindly let me know your readiness to help me.
Have a nice day and think about me. I attach here my pictures.  I will be expecting to receive your reply as soon as possible and i will tell you how we can proceed.
Yours sincerely,
Miss Malaria K. Bowden.

Too long email ... but same story as from other scammers ...

messages.body:
Dear Malaria K. Bowden,


I have tried to call the Rev father, but the line remains busy all the time. Probably this is the only phone for all the refugees I suppose.


With regards to the money transfer, I am ready to assist you. You can transfer it to my bank account and will take care of you, I mean, I will remove you from this camp and you will leave a nice life in Europe.


Just let me know how to proceed.


Take care.
messages.raw:
Franz Larzlo

Dear Malaria K. Bowden,

I have tried to call the Rev father, but the line remains busy all the time. Probably this is the only phone for all the refugees I suppose.

With regards to the money transfer, I am ready to assist you. You can transfer it to my bank account and will take care of you, I mean, I will remove you from this camp and you will leave a nice life in Europe.

Just let me know how to proceed.

Take care.

No, I didn't called of course ... but let they think that their phone is broken ...

messages.body:
to me



Hello My Dearest Franz,


Thanks for your mail and please always read all my mails very mail. I need your help to stand as my trustee to receive the deposit money of my late father to your bank account, it is legal. As i told you I have to get you involved in to this my late father funds because the finances Company advices me to get in touch with a responsible person who will stand on my behalf as regards to this money, because of my refugee status over here at the moment. and the expenses that will come up to make this transfer successful, This is why i offer you 30% of the total sum as compensation for your effort/Input after the successful transfer of this fund to your nominated account.
I have the death certificate of my late father which I also showed to the manager of the finances company, Please i want you to send me your Full name, company or home address, telephone and fax numbers with your identity picture so that i will know whom am dealing with.. As soon as I receive the information from you, I will also write the finances company that you are my trustee partner to receive my late father funds.
Please i want you to know that i believe in you, i have two reasons for choosing you, i choose d you because it is the will of God. and i believe knowing you will bring hope back again to my life. i believe you will never disappoint me once this funds is transfer to you, and please know that 30% of the total sum is your compensation for your assistant INPUT. I kept this secret to people in the camp. So in the light of above i will like you to keep this transfer to your self for security reason. Remember i am giving you all this information due to the trust i deposed on you. I like honest and understanding people,truthful,


The camp library missions telephone number is working please try and call me once again 00221-777927968. I will stop here Have a nice day while I hope to hear from you soon with your full details as i said above.
God bless us
Miss Malaria K.

God bless us
Miss Malaria K.

messages.body:
Dear Miss Malaria,


Glad to hearing.


I needed a lot of thinking over the weekend, if I am the right person to help you or not. After hours of walking in the streets and parks of my city, I have decided to help you.


I believe that a person deserves freedom. You deserve it more than anyone else.


I tried to call that nr but believe me, it is always busy busy busy...Maybe the reverend is too busy or the phone is being used by other refugees.


In order to start the transfer, I am sending you my details:


NAME: Franz Larzlo
AGE: 32
CITY: Budapest 
NATIONALITY: Hungarian 
OCCUPATION: sales
SEX: Male


If any other details are required, just let me know.


God bless you over there. Soon you will be out of this camp my dearest.


Kind regards,


Franz

Franz Larzlo

I needed a lot of thinking over the weekend, if I am the right person to help you or not. After hours of walking in the streets and parks of my city, I have decided to help you.

I believe that a person deserves freedom. You deserve it more than anyone else.

I tried to call that nr but believe me, it is always busy busy busy...Maybe the reverend is too busy or the phone is being used by other refugees.

In order to start the transfer, I am sending you my details:

If any other details are required, just let me know.

God bless you over there. Soon you will be out of this camp my dearest.

Kind regards,

Franz

Once again I told her (him) that the phone is busy hehehe

messages.body:
Good day My dearest Franz.


Thanks for your details and your concern to help me, our knowing each other is the will of God, and i hope you understand why i need your assistance to stand on my behalf to transfer my late father funds, Please I will like you to know that i am very happy for your caring towards this my condition to help me out as i request of you.. I am advising you to please keep the transfer of the money to yourself (for security reasons)
Right now i have wrote the finances company with your information that you are my trustee partner to receive my late father fund, so that they will tell us the procedure.  please know that i need your help in every way round and this is why i offer you 30% for your assistance in any expensive you made to achieve this transferring my late father fund.


I will stop here My dearest,  please try and send your contact phone number and your picture identity to know you. yes, the camp phone is little busy, but i will call you and you call me back. Thanks once again and God bless us,
 have a wonderful day.
Yours Miss Malaria K.

Yours Miss Malaria K.

Now she wants to call me ... nice try!!

messages.body:
Dearest Miss Malaria K.


You can trust me in this transaction. I am a serious man.


Will send a scanned copy of my passport in an hour.


Take care.


Franz
messages.raw:
Franz Larzlo

Dearest Miss Malaria K.

messages.body:
Good day My dearest Franz,


Thanks for your concern to help me, because sometimes when I take a look at the hectic world around me, I feel confused,but all of the noise fades away and I forget my worries when I think about your concern to help me. i trust you with all my life because it is the will of God that i contacted you. 
My dearest i received the Financial Company reply mail, and i know you receive it too? 
As i said before i need your help as you are all my hope and am trusting you with all my heart that you will not disappoint me once this money get to your care, 
i have two documents here with me , the death certificate and the deposit certificate, so as the Financial Company said we need lawyer here that will prepare the power of attorney on your name and affidavit of support with my signature, 
i will discuss and search for a lawyer and once i get contact i will let you know, i trust you my dearest and i want to see your picture, In my next mail i will send you all the scan copy's of the documents, take care as i wait to hear from you.


God bless us 
Yours Miss Malaria.

God bless us
Yours Miss Malaria.

messages.subject: STANDARD TRUST BANKING GROUP PLC
messages.body:
below here is the Financial company reply mail hope you received it , as i said in my first mail i will look for a lawyer for you here that will stand for us to prepare the request documents by the Bank, as soon as i get his contact i will keep you post with it to contact the lawyer.
take care as i will stop here,
1love




Standard Trust Banking home page                           Contact us
Application for Claim
For Your Kind Attention.

Sir, Mr Franz Larzlo.
I have been directed by the director of Foreign Operation/Wire Transfer to write you in respect to your partner mail which we have received with your details.. 


Actually,we have earlier been told about you by the young lady Ms Malaria K. Bowden. (the next of kin) that she wishes you to be her trustee/representative for the claim of her late father deposit with our bank..
Late Dr Kyama Bowden.. is our late customer with sum substantial amount of money he deposit with us  4,950,000.00 US Dollars. Hence you have been really appointed as a trustee to represent the next of Kin.

 C hose 1 of this 3 Option for the Transaction:
(1) Transferring Late Dr Kyama Bowden. deposit fund: Through a Diplomatic Agency Location
(2) Transferring Late Dr Kyama Bowden. deposit fund: In ATM Electronic Card with your full details, and we be send to you through Courier service,

(3) Transferring Late Dr Kyama Bowden. deposit fund: Bank to Bank 72hours banking working days. to your Account.
However before our bank will transact any business concerning the transfer of the fund Late Dr Kyama Bowden to your Choosing direction, We will like you to send the followings immediately to our bank: 
1.A power of attorney permit you to claim and transfer the funds to your bank account on her behalf. Note:This Power of attorney must be endorsed by a Senegalese resident lawyer. 
2. An Affidavit of support from the Senegalese high court with her signature in it. 
3.The original copy of death certificate of Late Dr Kyama Bowden. (Her deceased father) confirming his death. 
4.The original copy of deposit certificate issued to Late Dr Kyama Bowden.  by our bank.

Note: The above are compulsory,and are needed to protect our interest, yours and the next of kin after the transfer has been made These shall also ensure that a smooth,quick and successful transfer of the fund is made to your account in 72hours.

  We promise to give our customers the best of our services.Should you
have any question(s),please contact our Foreign Operational       



                                 
                      Group Finance Director-  Mr.Andrew Angest. 
                              Telephone: 00-447031812635,  00447031814692.    
                                 Fax-Nu 00-448447741728,+4487-0389-0218
                       Email: standard_trust_banking@accountant.com
                              Or: info-standardtrust-bank@london.com


                                    
             info-standardtrust@e-mile.co.uk or standard_trust.group_plc@mail.com
            Standard Trust House 102 Ropemaker Street  EC4R 2SB, United Kingdom 
MANAGEMENT STANDARD TRUST FINANCIAL GROUP PLC (S.T.F)

take care as i will stop here,
1love

They try hard, but come on, doesn't it looks all very amateurish these emails that they send "from banks"?

messages.body:
Good day Dearest Franz,


Thank's for your ability to assist me transfer the my late father money to your position pending my arrival to meet with you, it shows you are a dependable and trustworthy person. Listen i want you to know that  it is the will of God that me and you know each other.
Now,regarding the requests the bank needs from us i have with me here the deposit certificate receipt of deposit certificate. and the death certificate,(which i will give to this lawyer for the preparation of the documentation) I thought it's the only thing the bank will need from us but since they need the power of attorney and affidavit of support, i have informed the camp master about it and he gave me the contact of this lawyer below,he is a registered lawyer in the United Nations Camp and also a registered member in (Senegalese Bar Association) who will preparing the documents for us but according to him the documents will cost you little money.


Please i will like you to contact him through email and phone today,when your contacting him, tell him that you are my Foreign partner and you want him to prepare a power of attorney, affidavit of support  in your name to enable the transfer of my (Late) father's ACCOUNT in Finances Company to your account  in Your country. i want you that the documents request fees. His contact information is below.


Barrister: Advocate Thomas Cole.
E mail add(thomaschambers@voila.fr)
http://advocate.thomascole.voila.net
Or (advocate.thomas.cole@gmail.com)
Office telephone number. 00221-778-469-351


So, i will like you to contact him for the preparing of the power of attorney and the affidavit of support in your name, Please try and contact me when you are in contact with him and let me know the process.  Attachment here is My late father death certificate, Deposit certificate, Receipt of deposit, and My camp identity, i will stop here my dearest, take care and always keep in touch, May God bless you,  have a wonderful day, A big hug With trust from my deepest heart,
Yours Miss Malaria K..


ATTACHEMENTS: deposit, receipt, death certificate. All fake, of course!!!

messages.body:
Dec 7 (7 days ago)
to advocate.thoma.,
cc: Mis



Dear Mr. Advocate Thomas Cole,


I am writing you as the partner of Mrs. Malaria K Bowden.


She is willing to move to my country and I am ready to assist her with every steps. She also mentioned me a certain sum of money left by her late father so I need your assistance to transfer this money to my bank account.


Please send me the next steps to follow in order to conclude this transaction as soon as possible.


Be aware that Miss Malaria K Bowden is now in a refugee camp and I want her out of there immediately. I request you to do the necessary to bring her to a safe place before she can move to my country.


Do not be worried about expenses, because we will pay you back everything.


Awaiting your urgent action.


Franz Larzlo

Will this man help Miss Malaria? Will he take her out of the camp??

[ "Advocate Thomas Cole" - if actually a different person than "Miss Malaria" - will divide the loot with Miss Malaria according to a "sharing percentage". That's the dastardly plan, anyway.]

messages.body:
Cabinet Maître Thomas Cole Chambres Et Advocate-Conseils 
Bureau Regional Du Senegal (SNFO) 
101 Rue de Thann, La Dakar Sénégal. 
Tel:+ 221 778-469-351 
Fax:+ 221 330 209 954 
Email: (Advocate.thomas.cole@gmail.com) 
Web: http://advocate.thomascole.voila.net


  Dear Sir/ Mr Franz Larzlo. 


Sequel to your email on the issue of helping you to procure the necessary documents required by the Finances Company, to make your claims fund transfer to your account in your country. We are happy to be honored and promise to assist and represent you in all assigns.


Your partner Ms.Malaria K. Bowden. called my office to discuss about the issuing to you authorization letter that will enable you stand on her behalf to transfer her late father money from Finances Company. However from my inquiries to the federal high court , it will cost the sum of  780 dollars for authentication fund of the power of attorney, and the affidavit of support at the high court before it becomes valid and 550 dollars. for notary stamping at the notary republic 300 dollars My legal processing fee and registration to my chamber is 150 dollars total  ( 1,780 Dollars).


Attachment here is copy's of my passport and my lawyer  license identity for you to know whom you are dealing with. 


To speedy the process you are to send these money ( 1,780 Dollars). to me today through  Western-Union called Israel postal Bank or Money-Gram transfer system which is faster way of sending money. Use the below details of my accountant control name. to enable my noble office prepare and validate the power of attorney and the affidavit of support here in the high court and notary republic respectively..



Name: Anibaba Yetunde Oluronke.. 
Office add: 101 Rue de Thann, La Dakar Sénégal. 
office Tel:+ 221 778-469-351 
Test Question: 1+1 
Test Answer: good 
Amount: 1,780 Dollars


The cost of obtaining the document including our service fee is  ( 1,780 Dollars ) Also, it will take about  48hours to process the document. The affidavit of support will first be obtained from the federal High Court of Senegal and as soon as this is ready, we will proceed immediately to draft the Power of Attorney which will be dully signed by your partner and witness by me also naturalized by the federal magistrate.


To Process the documents we need the following information from you clearly.


(1) Your full residents country address as you will like it to appear in the document,  (2) Yours full name,  (3)  Yours contact telephone and fax  (4) copy page of your passport or any identification card.


NOTE: (WE RECEIVE PAYMENT BEFORE RENDERING SERVICES)MY PRIORITY IS TO RENDER THE BEST SERVICES TO MY CLIENTS.


Upon receipt of those fee's and the information needed to obtain this documents, we shall proceed immediately to procure the documents which will take us 48 hours to complete. 


Thanks.


Should you have any question, contact us at +221 778-469-351,


Yours faithfully,


Yours sincerely in service, 
Advocate Thomas Cole. 
(Principal Partner).(ESQ). 
Email: (thomaschambers@voila.fr) 
Web: http://advocate.thomascole.voila.net

Take care!

Franz

messages.body:
to Advocate,cc: Miss Malaria



Dear Mr. Cole,


I believe that you are not really reading my emails, are you??


Would you be happy if your daughter would be sitting into a refugee camp?


I have kindly asked you to contact Mrs. Malaria thru the phone from the reverend from the refugee camp!! You need to move Miss Malaria from there to a hotel in Dakar!!


Tell me what it will cost, I don't care, I will pay but you are my man in Senegal, you can solve this for me!!


Action sir!! Action!!!


A lot of money is involved here, so 3.000 USD are peanuts!!!


Priority now is to bring Miss Malaria to a safe place!


Just send me the bill, and a copy of the hotel booking right now!


Thanks!
Mr. Franz Larzlo

messages.body:
to Advocate



Dear Mr. Cole,


If you ever, but ever speak to me like this again, I will fire you from this job!


Do you know with whom you are dealing with???


Do you know who Miss Malaraia is???


Are you aware about the sum of money involved here???


Why can you not assist me to move Miss Malaria out of that camp???? I am not asking you to pay for that, just asking you for HELP!!!


Miss Malaria needs help!! You know that.


She came to me for HELP and I am helping her, but what are you doing? Paper work, Paper work, Paper work and cashing fees for that....


Lawyers are all the same over the world I think...


Now, please tell me, can you help Miss Malaria or not???

 
Franz

messages.body:
to Miss Malaria



My dearest,


How are you there? I hope doing well.


I believe that there is a problem.


You should better fire Mr. Cole from this case. He does not looks to be a competent lawyer.


I have kindly asked him to help me to move your from the camp to a Hotel but he is not willing to help.


And there is more!! He was very but very impolite in his last mail to me...He offended me...My honor was hurt...


My dear, should we look for another lawyer to conclude this money transfer?


Whatever your decision is, I will follow you.


Take care.


Franz

messages.body:
to Miss Malaria



My dearest,


I never ever meant to make you unhappy...I just wanted to help you. 


Are you happy in this camp? 


I was trying my best to take you out of there, nothing more than this...


But ok, I will pay the money to the lawyer, as you asked me. I want this transaction to be concluded as soon as possible, because I want you out of there!


Will keep you posted!


Take care!


My warmest regards to you. Be strong! Time is coming.


Franz

messages.body:
to Advocate



Dear Mr. Cole,


Consider yourself a very lucky man.


Miss Malaria is not going to fire you from this job and we will continue working with you.


So let's move now to the serious things.


Here is the data that you need from me:


(1) Your full residents country address as you will like it to appear in the document:


Rue Sainte Mairie 15
1000 Feerik Island
France


(2) Yours full name: Franz L. Larzlo


(3)  Yours contact telephone and fax: not available for the moment, as I  just moved


(4) copy page of your passport or any identification card - see attached: see attached


Now I am going to Western Union office to pay as follows:


Name: Anibaba Yetunde Oluronke..
Office add: 101 Rue de Thann, La Dakar Sénégal.
office Tel:+ 221 778-469-351
Test Question: 1+1
Test Answer: good
Amount: 1,780 Dollars


Now, one question. I have no US Dollars with me. As I am in Europe, I have EURO. 1780 US Dollar = 1.100 Euro.


Is that ok for you if I pay in Euro?


Another point, as it will be the first time that I will use the Western Union services, I need to go there to check how this works.


Please confirm this amount in Euro.


Thanks.


Franz Larzlo

With love,


Franz

messages.body:
to Advocate



URGENT - UERGENT - URGENT


Dear Mr. Cole,


I have been to a local Western Union office and I had a nice talk with the shop attendant. She has explained me the way it works and now everything seems to be clear for me.


The only point that concerns me is that she has mentioned some fraud cases by using this way of payment. She invited me into her office, offered me a cup of coffee and some chocolates while she explained me entire the security system.


In fact I have learned that they have many technologies that they use to help safeguard our personal information including Secure Socket Layer (SSL). The locked padlock you see in the bottom of your browser window tells you that we're encrypting the information coming back and forth across our connection. 


So I am ready for this Western Union experience. The sum to be sent is 1.100 Euro but they said that there is a charge to be deducted so I believe that you will receive around 1.000 Euro. Will that be ok for you? Yes I know, it is expensive, but it is fast and it is secure!


As soon I've got your message, I will move to the western union office again. Maggy will be glad to seeing me again.


Kind regards,


Franz Larzlo
messages.raw:
Franz Larzlo

to Advocate

URGENT - UERGENT - URGENT

Dear Mr. Cole,

I have been to a local Western Union office and I had a nice talk with the shop attendant. She has explained me the way it works and now everything seems to be clear for me.

The only point that concerns me is that she has mentioned some fraud cases by using this way of payment. She invited me into her office, offered me a cup of coffee and some chocolates while she explained me entire the security system.

In fact I have learned that they have many technologies that they use to help safeguard our personal information including Secure Socket Layer (SSL). The locked padlock you see in the bottom of your browser window tells you that we're encrypting the information coming back and forth across our connection.

So I am ready for this Western Union experience. The sum to be sent is 1.100 Euro but they said that there is a charge to be deducted so I believe that you will receive around 1.000 Euro. Will that be ok for you? Yes I know, it is expensive, but it is fast and it is secure!

As soon I've got your message, I will move to the western union office again. Maggy will be glad to seeing me again.

Kind regards,

Franz Larzlo

messages.body:
to me



Good Day My dear.
Thanks for your mails and i thank you very much for your wonderful assistant, and also for keeping me in touch, 
You brighten many of my days, You're someone I could never forget, Though sometimes the clouds are gray, When life gives us steep mountains to climb, We need to hold on and keep the faith, Believing everything will improve with time, During the quiet time that we have been given, We can reflect upon and know we are blessed..


Thanks once again, The lawyer just called me that you need to send him the Western Union receipt of the transfer to cash the money, because there is details requested by the local western union here before he can cash the money.


As for my health i am doing well here with every hope to meet with you immediately after the transfer of my late father money to your account.Thanks once agin My dear. have a good weekend, waiting for your mail.
yours Miss Malaria.

Yesterday I have paid 1100 euro to Anibaba Yetunde Oluronke but on way back from the western union office I've met some friends and we ended into a few bars...you know...friday night...

I am so happy that soon you will be joining me and my friends and that we will party all the night!!
Take care my dear.
Soon this will be concluded.
Your Franz

messages.body:
to Advocate



Mr. Cole!!!


I couldn't believe your email!!


Listen, now I will return the payment and block it.


Look, the paper slip from western union was forgotten into my pants and washed in the laundry.


Attached the proof.


Now, if I go on Monday to the local western union office, they will give me a duplicate and I would be able to send you the code.


Now, you apologize to me and we conclude this on a nice way on Monday, or I will have no option than firing you from the job.


Look to the attached file. On Monday I can go for a duplicate. Now you apologize to me and case closed.


Waiting for your email.


Franz

messages.body:
to Miss Malaria



My dear,


Why did you say that to me???


Probably Mr. Cole is behind this...


Listen, that lawyer is a stupid man, but we will keep him on the job now.


I know it is my fault but the paper slip from western union was forgotten into my pants and washed in the laundry.


Attached the proof.


On Monday I will go to the local western union office, and they will give me a duplicate and I will be able to send him the code.


Don't be so angry. Mr Cole is not handling well the case, but this was a misunderstanding. Everything will end very well, you will see.


Your Franz
